mapper.insert: insert into tbl_rule (ruleId, trackId, basic, applied, industry) values (#{ruleId}, #{trackId}, #{basic}, #{applied}, #{industry})
mapper.select: select ruleId, trackId, basic, applied, industry from tbl_rule where trackId = #{ruleNo}

select tr.ruleNo, tu.univTitle, tt.trackTitle, td.degreeTitle , tr.ruleId, tr.basic, tr.applied, tr.industry from tbl_rule as tr JOIN tbl_track as tt ON tt.trackNo = tr.trackId JOIN tbl_univ as tu ON tt.univNO = tu.univNo JOIN tbl_degree as td ON tr.ruleId = td.degreeId where ruleId = #{degree} and trackId = #{trackNo}
mapper.update: update tbl_rule set trackId=#{trackId}, ruleId=#{ruleId}, basic=#{basic}, applied=#{applied}, industry=#{industry} where ruleNo=#{ruleNo}
mapper.select: select tr.ruleNo, tu.univTitle, (select concat_ws(' - ', td.degreeTitle, tt.trackTitle)) as trackTitle, tr.ruleId, tr.basic, tr.applied, tr.industry from tbl_rule as tr JOIN tbl_track as tt ON tt.trackNo = tr.trackId JOIN tbl_univ as tu ON tt.univNO = tu.univNo JOIN tbl_degree as td ON tr.ruleId = td.degreeId order by trackId asc;

select tr.ruleNo, tu.univTitle, tt.trackTitle, td.degreeTitle, tr.ruleId, tr.basic, tr.applied, tr.industry, tr.trackId from tbl_rule as tr JOIN tbl_track as tt ON tt.trackNo = tr.trackId JOIN tbl_univ as tu ON tt.univNO = tu.univNo JOIN tbl_degree as td ON tr.ruleId = td.degreeId and tt.univNo = #{univNo} order by trackId asc, trackTitle asc;
